name: F1 Championship Season 2000
description:
F1 Championship Season 2000 is a simulation, sports and racing game developed by Electronic Arts Sports, Visual Sciences and Image Space. It came out on 30-11-2000. It was published by EA SPORTS. F1 Championship Season 2000 has a Metascore of 70, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play F1 Championship Season 2000 on PlayStation 2, PC, PlayStation and Classic Macintosh.
